1365.question: What are the tasks that this method has shown improvements?

5-Table1-1.png: The method has shown improvements in the precision of bilingual dictionary induction results for Spanish (ES), Italian (IT), German (DE) and Finnish (FI), using English (EN) as the source language.
8-Table4-1.png: The tasks that this method has shown improvements in are hypernym discovery and other related tasks.

1365.answer: bilingual dictionary induction, monolingual and cross-lingual word similarity, and cross-lingual hypernym discovery
